2090090.name: Grid Force - Mask of the Goddess Soundtrack
2090090.description:
Feel the beauty and culture of Gora from Grid Force – Mask of the Goddess with the game’s original score.
Grid Force – Mask of the Goddess (Official Soundtrack) boasts 19 tracks from the game, with 3 bonus tracks from the world of Gora, all of which are 90s-inspired bangers that underscore the characters, locations, and lightning-fast battles in the tactical bullet-hell RPG.
